localize.full_text: 従業員の燃え尽き症候群を防ぐための5つの秘訣は何ですか？Charlene Walters PhD (@CWaltersPhD), Business & Branding Mentor and Corporate Trainer, shares her best advice: https://t.co/hvPKdp6hg4 https://t.co/Bx6PlE95NM.
你有什么避免员工倦怠的5大建议？Charlene Walters PhD (@CWaltersPhD), Business & Branding Mentor and Corporate Trainer, share her best advice: https://t.co/hvPKdp6hg4 https://t.co/Bx6PlE95NM
你有什麼避免員工倦怠的5大建議？Charlene Walters PhD (@CWaltersPhD), Business & Branding Mentor and Corporate Trainer, share her best advice: https://t.co/hvPKdp6hg4 https://t.co/Bx6PlE95NM

previous.title: How will the midterm elections shape the next two years of Biden's presidency? California Congressman, @ericswalwell, says 'we still have a lot of work to do.' https://t.co/jRESQZz9zP https://t.co/o5WAe51Oib

localize.full_text: 中間選挙は、バイデン大統領の次の2年間をどう形成するのか？カリフォルニア州選出の下院議員、@ericswalwellは「まだやるべきことはたくさんある」と語る https://t.co/jRESQZz9zP https://t.co/o5WAe51Oib
中期选举将如何塑造拜登未来两年的总统任期？加州议员@ericswalwell表示，"我们还有很多工作要做。" https://t.co/jRESQZz9zP https://t.co/o5WAe51Oib

next.title: Do only humans have genders? Frans de Waal, biologist, primatologist, professor at Emory University, and author of 'Different', shares his insights. https://t.co/XNnht1tafm https://t.co/iYFDJ2nmfk

localize.full_text: 性別があるのは人間だけ？生物学者、霊長類学者、エモリー大学教授、『Different』の著者であるフランツ・デ・ワール氏がその洞察を語る。https://t.co/XNnht1tafm https://t.co/iYFDJ2nmfk。
只有人类有性别吗？生物学家、灵长类动物学家、埃默里大学教授、《异类》一书的作者Frans de Waal分享了他的见解。https://t.co/XNnht1tafm https://t.co/iYFDJ2nmfk
只有人類有性別嗎？生物學家、靈長類動物學家、埃默裏大學教授、《異類》一書的作者Frans de Waal分享了他的見解。https://t.co/XNnht1tafm https://t.co/iYFDJ2nmfk
